channel.title: European Union on Debate Library
channel.description: Recent content in European Union on Debate Library

item.title: Assumindo que a Rússia e a Ucrânia ratificam um tratado de paz, ECA que a União Europeia deveria facilitar a concessão do estatuto de Estado-Membro à Ucrânia.
This House Believes That the EU should ban Pegasus and similar software
This House Believes That the EU should create a specialized court responsible for investigating and prosecuting political corruption across its member states
